basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Salmonella, Bacillus cereus, Bacillus megaterium, Lactobacillus casei, Leptostylus viridescens, Lactobacillus plantarum CGMCC 1.3, Myotis flavus, Corynebacterium glutamicum, Corynebacterium crenatum, Leuconostoc mesenteroides, Bacillus thuringiensis, Streptococcus faecalis CGMCC.
